oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-12-08 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 8, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performers Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Blues, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Lew Childre, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys; Grandpa Jones; Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ray Price introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Ray Price introduces Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys -- Christmas Time's A-Comin' (Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys) -- Ray Price introduces Grandpa Jones -- Get Along Home Cindy (Grandpa Jones) -- Ray Price talks -- I've Got A New Heartache (Ray Price) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ray Price) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Blue Grass Boys
